article.title: U.S. Export Assistance Centers of New York Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the U.S. Export Assistance Centers of New York.
article.content:
​The U.S. Export Assistance Centers that serve exporters across New York State:

  • Buffalo/Rochester U.S. Export Assistance Centers
  • Westchester U.S. Export Assistance Center
  • Harlem U.S. Export Assistance Center
  • New York City U.S. Export Assistance Center
  • Long Island U.S. Export Assistance Center

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800.872.8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjugation with your local office. For immediate export assistance, or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am – 6:00pm Eastern Time.​

Note for Importers: Contact U.S. Customs at 877.227.5511​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the U.S. Export Assistance Centers of New York.
